Quote String: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
Failure is not an option here. If things are failing, you are not innovating enough.
Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
Develop a learning passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
Education is the movement from darkness to light.
Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
A river cuts through rock not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
If it is important to you, you will find a way. If not, you'll find an excuse.
If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small.
What you allow is what will continue.
The person who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The person who walks alone is likely to find himself in places no one has ever seen before
If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change the way you think about it.
Running away from your problems is a race you'll never win.
I knew that if I failed I wouldn’t regret that, but I knew the one thing I might regret is not trying.
Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
